subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The move seems simple: the Rockets sign Dwight Howard and become instant contenders. In fact, it was the culmination of a two-year campaign based on hope and hunches.
snippet: The move seems simple: the Rockets sign Dwight Howard and become instant contenders. In fact, it was the culmination of a two-year campaign based on hope and hunches.
